page.title: 08"BANGER RACING"
page.content: One of the most exciting forms of {recreation}in the area takes place on waste ground in Parkeston: this is {"banger Racing".}Quite a few people go to watch this although they weren't too sure whether they were looking for skilllful driving or hoping to see plenty of crashes! Anyway they were able to see both with the cars speeding round the track and smashing into each other until the race finishes. Those who went regularly said that it was a very exciting sport,although one person had been badly burned just recently. All of them said that they would keep going. One local team is from the{Harwich {School.}Part of the work of the metalwork department is to convert old cars into "banger racers" and race them.
